titles.title: Casa for Every Child Act of 2007
To amend part E of title IV of the Social Security Act to require States to provide foster children with court-appointed special advocates who meet national standards, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Income Security and Family Support.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 8/1/2007--Introduced. A Casa for Every Child Act of 2007 - Amends part E (Foster Care and Adoption Assistance) of title IV of the Social Security Act to require states to provide foster children with court-appointed special advocates who meet national standards.
